title: Amara Kundanalu: Emerald, Pearl, and Ruby Earrings
features: Circular stud design inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry. Features a central pearl surrounded by polki diamonds, followed by a ring of seed pearls. The outer ring is adorned with alternating emerald beads and ruby teardrops, meticulously hand-set in a gold bezel setting. The use of faceted gems adds a modern touch to a classic design.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or as a sophisticated everyday statement piece. Perfect for Seemantham
description: These Amara Kundanalu (earrings) are a unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern gemstone cutting techniques. The use of high-quality Zambian emeralds and Burmese rubies ensures vibrancy and lasting beauty. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the pearl and diamond combination provides a timeless elegance. Each earring is carefully handcrafted by skilled artisans, making it a treasured heirloom.
